channel.title: 🏢 University of Granada on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of Granada on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Sm: enhanced localization in Multiple Instance Learning for medical imaging classification
item.description: SmMIL enhances medical image classification by introducing a novel smooth operator to improve instance-level localization in multiple instance learning, achieving state-of-the-art results.
